alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Cumberland; Kennebec; Lincoln; Oxford; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:42PM EDT until July 21 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Kennebec County in south central Maine... Southeastern Oxford County in western Maine... Southern Androscoggin County in southwestern Maine... Southwestern Lincoln County in south central Maine... Central Cumberland County in southwestern Maine... Sagadahoc County in south central Maine... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 441 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gray, or 14 miles east of Naples, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Brunswick, Bath, Gardiner, Topsham, Wiscasset, Cumberland, Falmouth, Freeport, Gray, Litchfield, Farmingdale, Georgetown, Woolwich, Yarmouth, Raymond, Lisbon, Harpswell, Greene and Durham. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 16 and 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 55 and 104. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Cumberland; Kennebec; Lincoln; Oxford; Sagadahoc
